website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, warm, and water-resistant winter boot that is a good buy for the price but tends to run large.
pros: A good value for the money, these boots get top marks for their design, warmth, and comfort
Good quality for about half the cost of some other winter boot styles
cons: This boot style tends to run large, requires break-in time, and are not as long-lasting and durable as some of the others

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: My husband works in a freezer, and takes a size 15 boot. We have such a difficult time trying to find a warm, durable boot in his size that doesn't cost a fortune. We took a chance on this boot, and were pleasantly surprised. The boot is comfortable, warm (he works in temps well below zero), and comes in his size! You can't beat this book for the price. We will definitely be repeat customers. Thank you for making such a great product at an equally great price!
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and it has great aesthetics
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, fashionable, and does what it suppose to. I cannot believe these are $55. It is sturdy and it has great aesthetics. Well insulated to keep your feet warm even without socks. I had the pleasure to take a vacation in South Lake Tahoe and I never slipped or fell. No leaks. Water never got inside the shoe. Most snow boots do not look good. This one looks great and I enjoyed wearing it out in the snow and the Granlibakken Tahoe site. This is a great alternative to brands like Columbia. I highly recommend these. It looks and feels more than it is priced.
customer_reviews.author: Elann

customer_reviews.title: Good Boots Bad Laces
customer_reviews.text: The laces came apart after just a few days of normal use. (See pic.) The manufacturer is apparently aware of this problem because they send an extra pair of laces with the boots. A better solution would be to use stronger material for the laces. Otherwise the boots are good, warm and light. I may try to find better laces for them.
customer_reviews.author: DGB

customer_reviews.title: ... he works in the snow and he was very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots for my brother because he works in the snow and he was very happy with them. The boots fitted him as expected, very warm, tight fit due to the isolation but as soon as you wear them for a week or 2 you'll get used to them. Very warm in the winter specially if you work outside plowing i would totally recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Juan villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my husband. He really likes them. He said they were comfortable from day one. We live in Maine and the winters are tough on foot wear during to high amounts of snow & ice. Add in all the sand and salt that is used everywhere - if they aren't quality boots, they won't make it past one season. It appears these are perfect for our winter. There is a lot of grip to them that keeps him from sliding or slipping. Being comfortable is really important, as he is on his feet most of his 11 hour days at work. They also aren't too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Good Boot for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected after having read the reviews! (Thank You!) Good boot for the money. Bought them for 12-year-old son. Bought them larger so he can wear layers and use them next year (maybe). Got a men’s size 8. He usually wears a 7.5-8 in running sneakers (Under Armour & Nike) Yes, big & bulkier than he’s used to, but good enough to get dirty and deal with New England’s unpredictable weather. Hoping they’ll work out ok for the snow. Haven’t had to deal with that yet! I believe they’ll be alright for intermittent times in snowdrifts. Will probably get cold feet if prolonged exposure. They’ll not for Mountain Life.
customer_reviews.author: NewEnglandMom

customer_reviews.title: Boots were a good value, Kept feet reasonable dry and warm in Minnesota Weather
customer_reviews.text: It took two tries to get the proper size. I am normally a 14 but had to move up to a 15 to get a boot that was wide enough and didn't squeeze my feet. The boot was reasonably priced, under $60 as compared to other boots that run over $200 and are even tighter than these. For the number of times I wear these in a year I cannot justify spending that much so these fit the bill. The padding in the boot seemed comfortable. I would have preferred a removable lining but for the number of times I wear them, and in a $60 boot, this was acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: MJK

customer_reviews.title: Tried to like but just could not in the end
customer_reviews.text: I tried to like these boots but I just could not they were very uncomfortable hard to lace up feel like if I pulled too tight I would break up an eyelets on the on the boot. I wore very heavy socks even inserts from other boots that I have still could not get a comfortable feeling these things. I sent them back and bought a pair of Merrill Gore-Tex mid ankle boots and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Invest in better boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are pretty uncomfortable. They are very loose around my ankles and rub my skin raw when I walk any distance in them. Unfortunately the laces don't sinch down enough to fix this issue. They are also not well insulated. My toes were completely numb after being in the snow for only 1 hour. I would highly recommend investing in some better boots!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Kept me decently warm for NYC when I was there ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept me decently warm for NYC when I was there for Christmas holiday. However, this is my second pair because the previous pair I bought was 8 (M) US and was definitely too small even though normally I wear 7.5 (M) US. Got 8.5 instead and it fits well, so you might want to get 2 sizes larger if you ever want to buy one. If you are wearing fleece socks however, get at least 3 sizes larger. Tried wearing this with fleece socks and I wish I had gotten the 9 (M) US instead. Was dying on the plane wearing these with fleece socks. Remove 1 star from these because sometimes they leave my right foot slightly sore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These do what they are supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I’m probably not the best candidate to rate these because of the fact I’m not one to wear boots at all. That being said, you could take the following with a grain of salt. These boots fit great and did as advertised but to me they are very stiff and after wearing them a few times during our New Years vacation, I got burn marks on both legs just above my ankles. This is either cause they’re too stiff or I’m just not used to boots whatsoever. Like I said, take the above accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: esp3louis

customer_reviews.title: Warm and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and provide good support to ankles. I like that the sole is thick and bottom is mostly rubber so they are very water resistant. Bought these to replace other snow boots. They are very comfortable. I say somewhat small just because a men's 8 should be a women's 10. I generally wear a women's size 9 and these fit, but don't have too much extra room. Fortunately, they are warm enough it's not necessary to wear super thick socks so works out. The construction looks as if they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: A really well made boot.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son. He loves them. He said they are so comfortable, and warm, and being waterproof is another great added comfort. The perfect pair of boots for cold weather for the price I paid for them. I'll know what he'll need another 2 yrs. or so from now. His last pair lasted 2 years. Good deal! These are not EH tested. But, then again my son doesn't work with electricity. I suggest you search Amazon's site for an EH tested men's boot. There are a few on here. He will not take these boots off. He even has begun to wear them like a normal, every day shoe. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sylly

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different boot that didn't fit so I returned them and bought these boots instead. I'm very happy I did. They fit better, feel better, and are very comfortable. To me they feel like bulky sneakers instead of boots. I work for a major delivery company and I'm jumping in and out of a truck all day. My feet stayed warm and dry. I'm very happy with these boots. I've only worn them through one winter so far but I'd buy another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: DC8 from Philly

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT AND PRICED EXTREMELY WELL
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to go on a trip to Germany, and thought they would be awkwardly bulky... They actually fit really well, and they are LIGHT WEIGHT and WARM! I did order one size larger than my standard shoe size to accommodate thick wool socks for the alpine weather, and they fit like a glove. The price is definitely right and I am not sorry for taking a chance on this one! The supplier had this order on my doorstep in TWO DAYS!!! Double "BRAVO"
customer_reviews.author: Lenny The Wrench

customer_reviews.title: High quality boots for an inexpensive price - AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for a family ski trip we planned for this past winter. I wasn’t sure if they would be good quality because the price was inexpensive - so I wasn’t expecting much... We took them on our trip where it was constantly snowing and we spent well over 8+ hours outside each day. His feet never got wet or cold! He said these boots are one of the best pairs he has ever owned. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: The top looks new. The bottom had paint peeled off which made it looks used and returned
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came today. The top looks new. The bottom had paint peeled off which made it looks used and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Squid Season Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but mine leaked in first 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Boot runs just slightly big, okay for snow boots. Not as warm as I had hoped. Came with two sets of laces, but the laces don’t stay tied. Waterproof was excellent until one developed a leak in the seam. No contact for customer service. Fail.
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Nice snow boots
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly on time. Boots fit as described. I like the tread pattern and should fit crampons and seem like they'd fit easy into snow shoes. For being a soft toe boot they are pretty stiff. Some other reviews mentioned the laces. They came with an extra set. I always swap mine out with 550 cord anyways.
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: First impression is that these are a great value for the money, easily comparable to more expensive brands. They look and feel great and seem well constructed. They are just slightly large and the insulation (although it's Thinsulate) is a little thin, but bulking up on socks should make up for that. I will update this review after a little time and after the boots go through some more serious wear.
customer_reviews.author: 🇺🇸 PATRIOT 🇺🇲

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY boot, best price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for snowshoeing. They are ideal. Showed up better than expected. I wear a womens size 9.5 or 10, I have wide feet, and I ordered a 7.5. They fit great! I could have gone with an 8 as well to fit thicker socks, but I didn't want them to be big everywhere else since they are mens so I went with the 7.5. I'm so dang excited to take them for a spin!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Height
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived 1 day sooner than was listed as arrival date. The boot has plenty of room for wearing with thicker socks. The only down side for me is getting use to the difference in height from my previous boot, but is getting better each time I wear it. So far has been warm enough but have not had really cold weather yet. I Live in Minnesota and walk my dogs 2 times a day so I hope these will be a good alternative to the more expensive Colombian boots I had before.
customer_reviews.author: MARK PAULSEN

customer_reviews.title: Value purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair that I had to send back. I received 1 shoe size 14 and 1 shoe size 15. I reordered another not quite the same but similar. I'm pleased to say I received two the same size. Shipped very quickly. Hasn't been cold enough to wear them yet. Mainly got them for hunting. Seem well made. Should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad quality for the price. It is stiffer than the more expensive winter boots I purchased. Reviews stated it is true to size or runs large. This is not the case. I normally wear a mens size 7, so I ordered a 7.5 to account for a larger sock. When I received it, I tried it on with a normal weight dress cotton sock. My toes were up against the front of the boot. Not sure if I will order another size, but if I do, it will be 8.5. It comes with an extra pair of shoe laces and appears to be decent quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: cdmclub

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff uppers. Scraped my leg even with over calf socks.
customer_reviews.text: Scraped my upper leg to raw, even with calf length socks. Sent back
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E.

customer_reviews.title: Don't throw your money away
customer_reviews.text: Not a good pair of boots. I haven't had them very long. I used the boots for work and being a truck driver the boots didn't hold up. They have already started falling apart and my feet are getting wet and cold. The boots never was all that good on keeping my feet warm. So thank you for helping me throw away my money on a cheap made pair of boots. Now I have to go spend more money for another pair. And no I won't ever buy anything with the brand name arctiv8 again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable snow boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots are very comfortable i ordered half size above my shoe size they fit well. I wore them in 6 inches of snow all day yesterday and the boots did not tire me out at all. Only thing i dont like is they are pretty hard to tighted with the strings but i think because they're new. Im very happy with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is not accurate, and runs small.
customer_reviews.text: This manufacturer is correct in U.S. sizing. It is not on the European sizing. If your a woman's 9 your better off to order the men's 9 in this product.
customer_reviews.author: pat bosi

customer_reviews.title: First day with them and he loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for my BF They arrived yesterday so he is wearing them for the 1st time today but during the trial on the shoe is true to size very nice sleek look the boot is definitely a bit heavy He put them on they were easy to put on and comfortable when he was walking around the house he is a mailman on his feet for 8 to 10 hours walking so we will find out if the boots pass the test ..but overall so far so so so good ...
customer_reviews.author: CHRISSIE

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect, but they are warm, comfortable and genuinely waterproof. I hiked through some deep snow and my feet were warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: JL Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for a winter, wilderness camping trip in the Adirondack Mounts in NY. These boots were sturdy and very warm. My feet didn't get cold once even after wearing them for three straight days in February winter weather. They were also very comfortable when hiking on the trail with good traction. For the price, quality, comfort, and style I highly recommend these boots. If you're on the fence, just buy them! You'll be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Felt comfortable for 15 to 20 minutes. They do not breath which cause my feet to sweat and get cold in the Alaska winter here in Bethel. I would not recommend these to anyone in winter just do to what I said. You will freeze.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! Plush and comfortable for the gym and just walking about with my extra bulk. Be aware, they run slightly big, which was great for me. I really love these boots and the price was right! NOTE: my review is not a bogus one.
customer_reviews.author: K. P. Florio

customer_reviews.title: Super value, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad looking pair of boots for husbands work. He needed something heavy duty enough for dockwork that he does that held up in wet weather & around water. These fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!!! Lasted 3 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Fit was fine look was good... However they tore apart in just 3 weeks ... Junk... Waste of money !!! Very angry...
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality boot
customer_reviews.text: I looked at the reviews for the boot before I got them and it lived up to its reputation I use them for a work boot and they are extremely comfortable relatively lite for a big boot and definitely water proof if I need another pair I would most likely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: OsheaOmalley

customer_reviews.title: Brutal
customer_reviews.text: They killed my legs. Too tall. Rubbed my legs just above the ankles. Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I am a true size 10.5 with wide feet. This boot was a perfect fit!!! Great quality and very comfortable!!! I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: "V"

customer_reviews.title: Price point!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time! Super perfect fit! Great price point for a great boot! Can’t say anything bad about it at this point and I give a lot of feedback about the products I purchase and they are not always great I assure you that! So that’s saying a lot about those boot!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent proven results in the North Carolina mountains during a snow storm. Greatvtraction in snow and ice, very warm and durable. Fairly lightweight, so fatigue climbing was minimized. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan White

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: These boots ran a little larger than expected so I couldn't tie them tight enough for my feet. I was able to buy some thicker insoles which I would recommend doing regardless because the insoles aren't that comfortable. These boots are very durable, they have become my work boots and have held up well going through thick mud, climbing ladders, and the label is very accurate when it says they are waterproof! I highly recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Byars

customer_reviews.title: Warm and dry!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and he loves them. Was out working in the snow and his pants were wet up to his knees but his feet were completely dry and warm. Definitely recommend! I'm about to order a 2nd pair just to have a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina R.

customer_reviews.title: These don't work for me!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are soft under foot, but are unbelievably uncomfortable around the ankle. They chaffed me so bad around the upper ankles that I simply cannot wear them. It feels like they are pulling out all of my leg hairs every time i take a step, and that was with my wool ski socks pulled up. I would avoid these.
customer_reviews.author: coacher1

customer_reviews.title: Good Boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband, he needed a comfortable, waterproof boot that would work in the snow. So far they are working great for him. They arrived quickly and he likes them so far!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Inserts needed
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice boots for snow and mud. They do need a good supportive insert to be comfortable and for extended walking of standing for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: You betcha going to keep your feet warm and toasty
customer_reviews.text: My feet don't get cold in these. I put them to the test first day I got them that 9 inches of snow in minus single-digit temperatures for 10 hours straight at Ford Field here in Michigan and they worked awesome above and beyond for the price thank you
customer_reviews.author: Biggdaddy1964

customer_reviews.title: Another great find
customer_reviews.text: Another son wears these and finds them to be suitable. He's, 6'2 and wears them in the snow on his college campus as well. He's a body builder and finds them suitable also.
customer_reviews.author: V. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. They are very comfortable and probably the warmest boots I have ever bought. Temps hit in the negatives here in Michigan right after i got these and I have to say these boots kept my feet as warm as if i were inside with my slippers on. I believe these boot will last a while. they very well constructed and feel very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tb

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Husband really likes them. He has very large feet, and makes sizing harder, but they fit wonderfully and have been waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Burns

customer_reviews.title: It keeps your feet warm and dry
customer_reviews.text: It’s best to order whole sizes . I ordered a 71/2 mens but I need an 8 . It’s just off a half size . It keeps my feet warm and dry I really like them and I’ve not had anymore pain in my leg or feet.This is a good choice to keep warm and stable .
customer_reviews.author: E Bedford

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these, way more than I had anticipated. He wears them when it's cold and snowy outside, and when it's freezing and slippery. He loves them for when he goes hunting. These are so great! I'm so happy he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Got for ice fishing. They are warm and have decent traction on the bottom too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: They are a great fit but the rubber on the back rubs the back of the ankle!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my husband since he does a lot of work in various types of weather and I felt like the description matched what he needed he loves his boots his only complaint is that the back of his ankles are raw because they rub up against the back otherwise he loves them and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: jamilla bartley

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive Boot
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to basically be used for clearing the driveway in a snowstorm. These fit the bill. They are warm, lightweight, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mark murphy

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I’ve ever owned. I have no complaints. Beyond comfortable. I won’t in these boots everyday outside in the snow and they have kept my feet beyond warm. They have a cushioned sole so I can stand in them for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Aybar

customer_reviews.title: Fortress for my feet
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and comfortable boots. If I wear them in the house they get too warm. Outside in the snow, my feet wouldn’t know if they were on snow or sand. Nice and warm. Good traction too, when I take out the snow blower and walk around with that beast, I don’t slip at all.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Boots do not perform down to -25 degree weather.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these boots with a pair of wigwam 69% wool socks in plus 20 degree weather, and my feet after 30 minutes got cold. The second time I wore them in 26 degree weather I put on a second pair of wigwam socks. This finally kept my feet warm. Buyer beware, these boots are not as advertised. Double up on your wool socks, if you want to keep your feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first about if this product was god at this price point. I was mistaken!! This boot is of very good quality and performs great in the cold weather. Just what I needed!! Build quality is super great!!
customer_reviews.author: Washdog32

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are the warmest, comfiest boots ever! My boyfriend is a tow truck driver in Northern Minnesota and it gets ridiculously cold here. These are absolutely perfect for that! He normally wears an 11.5, but we sized up and got a size 12. They fit great and he's still able to layer an extra pair of socks in them! Would definitely recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Toldo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty decent boots. I bought them for hunting, they kept my feet warm and dry. I don't have any complaints, they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: enewman17

customer_reviews.title: its a shame because they felt like really nice boots
customer_reviews.text: sole came off after 3 uses. was told i had to pay to return wich would have been half the price. not worth the headache. its a shame because they felt like really nice boots!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Decent boot for a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, Im happy with my purchase of this boot. You get what you pay for plus a little extra. The boot fits as expected with a nice, thick pair of thermal or regular boot socks. Excellent traction in snow and on icy, slick rocks and roads. The low point for me was they were not as warm as I expected (I suppose that's why there's enough room for thick socks), however the was no real issue with 20° weather. I hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hiking/Work Boot
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price. They do run on the larger side fit wise, I normally wear a 10.5 so that's what I purchased, these were a full size too large.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for the price. Waterproof and very comfortable. Totally recommend. Buy without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT BOVARA

customer_reviews.title: Boot design needs improvement but very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the boots. However, within 2 weeks the metal clips near the top of the boots broke off making it difficult to tie the boots. The boots are comfortable and serve the purpose although the design needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce N.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but no grip
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were in great condition and as expected. The only downside is there is no grip on the bottom at all. We live in an icy place so having good grip is important, but the bottom of the shoe felt like cheap Styrofoam. If it weren't for that we would keep them. But I'm returning... too bad. These shoes seemed great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Winter Boots ,,, Great Fit ,,, Warm During Very Cold New England Weather ,,, No Leaks ,,, Comfortable
customer_reviews.author: IMABAJIM

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: These boots look good and they felt ok on my feet. The problem is my socks are wet after every walk outside. I have other boots that are much more water proof(red wings heritage moc style 877). Also, the laces are ruined after a month of ownership, and the boot overall isn't going to last more than a couple more months. So they were a 1 season boot. Next year I'll spend more for something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: David McKelvie

customer_reviews.title: Made strong rubber.
customer_reviews.text: Nice strong sturdy tough boot. Made of nice thick rubber. All one piece so they can't leak water in unless it goes from the top of the boot n unless you ain't wearing pants that won't happen. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful value
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband. He wears a size 12 and these fit perfect. Very comfortable after being on his feet all day, nice and warm and kept his feet dry as well. For the price, these are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: TsunamiMommyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Keep my feet nice n warm.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I work in s warehouse so no heat, been keeping me warm n dry.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality material, insulation, and construction. Love the fact that it came with an extra pair of shoestrings.
customer_reviews.author: David M Carraway

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cost effective and well built
customer_reviews.text: I work outdoor doing delivery during the winter in the snow, sleet and rain. At the end of the 12 hr day my feet was dry and comfortable. It was great for the adverse condition.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, warm and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, warm and stylish. Needing a good pair of boots for snow days, I was drawn to these by the way they looked. They reminded me of some futuristic military gear from a sci-fi movie or videogame. The description promised comfort, dryness, warmth and durability. So far, the boots have delivered on those promises.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: For the money you can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Good boot for the money.Works great and warm enough for Minnesota winters.It could use a little more arch in the boot but a set of arch supports do make them nice.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy D

customer_reviews.title: Kept my feet warm and dry in Iceland. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept my feet warm and dry in Iceland. I needed crampons to avoid slipping on ice (as a Californian who doesn't need to deal with that normally), but they worked perfectly with those.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof tested
customer_reviews.text: I have to break it in for a bit. I like that it's waterproof! Perfect for snow and rain!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Boot
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well build. Wore for a few hours to check the comfort and fit and both were good. Have worn when wet or cold yet. Longevity will be determined over time. Good looking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Kent G.

customer_reviews.title: Quality winter boots
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. Ordered for my 11 year old son and I wear 8 1/2-9 women's and I can wear them also. I may need a pair myself. Very good quality and the price was good
customer_reviews.author: leanna

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: So far just based on wearing it around but not in cold snowy or wet conditions. Will update after winter
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have only had them for two days. First day they were a little stiff but now that they are getting broken in they are good. We will see in a month or so how the arches hold up for me.
customer_reviews.author: G Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Best quality boot for a very low price
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a pair of boots like these before and I must say they are much than expected. A bit on the bully side. The inside is perfect and very comfortable. The outer sole is perfect for all terrains. When I tried them on I was even more shocked at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Seems like they'll hold up, comfortable for long days on the lot moving snow
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ehrhardt

customer_reviews.title: Beating old mam winter's cold
customer_reviews.text: With a warm insulated socks it adds to the comfort and protection vs wind, cold, water. It full fill the advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: yayabo

customer_reviews.title: Great booy.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Warm, great value, order a half size more for thicker socks
customer_reviews.author: allen paquette

customer_reviews.title: Decent boots.
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by the first impression. They fit him well and are reported to be comfortable and warm. They seem nice for the price. Hopefully they will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jmom234

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T HAVE A SIZE PROBLEM LIKE NOW,
customer_reviews.text: i HAD THIS SAME BRAND BEFORE 8 YEARS AGO ..DIDN'T HAVE A SIZE PROBLEM LIKE NOW ,,I TO RETURNED. FOR A HALF SIZE LARGER..IN GENERAL TODAY SHOE SIZE HAS NO STANDARD ..HIT OR MISS SITUATION... WHAT CAN I TELL YA...
customer_reviews.author: David Geegoo

customer_reviews.title: happiness lasted a little
customer_reviews.text: the boots arrived in good condition are very beautiful but they are not resistant to the cold I put them on today and immediately upon contact with the cold of the place I was, my feet were frozen and they are not anti-fatigue I am hanging on to return them
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Montesinos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit perfectly. They are durable, high-quality. They are perfect for the snow and wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: Monica D Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Feet stay dry in all types of wheather even when walking through water
customer_reviews.text: A quality boot with reasonable price verses the malls or boot stores and feet stays dry and warm
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne A. Ingram Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots! Well made!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome and well made however, they run small. I usually wear a womens size 8/8.5 and a men's 6.5 but ordered a size 7. I had to send them back and order a size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.P

customer_reviews.title: Hold up well for low price
customer_reviews.text: They get the job done and are an amazing buy for the low price!
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: CHRISTMAS GIFT
customer_reviews.text: ...received in a quick and timely manner, good to have this business provide size 15 footwear (which are difficult to locate in size and reasonable cost from other providers); holiday gift for the neighborhood's hauler (removal of unwanted yard and household items, yard landscape, paint), goes through many pair of boots throughout the seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Darshay

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very good foot wear sturdy durable boots at great price
customer_reviews.author: Tinamarie

customer_reviews.title: A definite recommendation
customer_reviews.text: Its well more insulated and the binding and stitching around the edges are still in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Nemiko H.

customer_reviews.title: try real hard and youll have wet feet
customer_reviews.text: walk through the creek, submerged to mid ankle, water will get in. But that isnt the intended use, these are very comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this shoe casually for about 1 week. so far, so good. I like how it feel inside which is soft. Having really test in deep water to see if it waterproof. For now, it doing its job at keeping my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: emmie

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, don't buy these for long-term use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Tahoe trip this year. They look nice and did keep my feet warm, but they are extremely uncomfortable if you are going to walk for more than 20 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and very warm. They just hurt a lot when I had them tied tight but now I don't bother tieing them and their very comfy, no pain.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine with them, I tried them under the shower. They are really waterproof. I didn’t wear them right now, because is still hot. For now I will recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Slavchev

product_meta.title: NORTIV 8 Men's Insulated Waterproof Construction Rubber Sole Winter Snow Skii Boots
feature_bullets: Durable Rubber outsole with multi-directional lugs for traction on varied terrain
Cold-weather boot featuring waterproof shell bottom unit, 200g Thermolite insulation rated to -25F
Cushioned EVA footbed for supportive comfort. All-weather protection and a toasty layer of insulation.
Premium Water Proof Upper, Oil and Slip Resistant.
Measurements: Heel Height: 1 in, Platform 0.75 in, Circumference: 13 in, Shaft: 6 in.
